description: Detects evade to Macie detection. Author: Sittikorn S. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: AWS Macie Evasion
query: eventName:("ArchiveFindings" OR "CreateFindingsFilter" OR "DeleteMember" OR "DisassociateFromMasterAccount" OR "DisassociateMember" OR "DisableMacie" OR "DisableOrganizationAdminAccount" OR "UpdateFindingsFilter" OR "UpdateMacieSession" OR "UpdateMemberSession" OR "UpdateClassificationJob")
